participant_1.name: Alice
participant_1.personality: Inquisitive and playful, Alice enjoys engaging conversations. She has a laid-back attitude and finds joy in simple pleasures.
participant_1.background: I compete in dog agility classes. I hate the color orange. I went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. I do not care about fashion. I dance on the weekends.

participant_2.name: Larry
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate, Larry finds inspiration in cooking and comic books. He often expresses himself in a humorous and light-hearted manner.
participant_2.background: Spiderman is my favorite. Hey my name is Larry and I am a chef. I also love comic books. If I'm not cooking in the kitchen then I'm definitely on the water.

but why you do not cook if you love to? if i'm not cooking in the kitchen then i'm definitely on the water.
